interactivity.requirements: 15 Ami Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " No One Can See Us " from Ami Arakawa Seen " Secrets Worth Keeping " from Maya Makinami

progression.synopsis: Ami recruits Sensei to help her go grocery shopping. They both dislike the oppressive heat, and Ami suggests going on vacation somewhere. Given that they can't leave the area and school hasn't finished yet, she suggests the beach. Sensei agrees, and is surprised when Ami asks if he can afford accommodation for "all of us" — it turns out that she's going to invite the whole class.
trivia: The conversation with Ami is a bit different depending on Sensei's choice in No One Can See Us .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
